Sinopse: VICTOR YOUNG PEREZ is a historical drama based on the true story of Victor Perez, who became a boxing world champion during the 30s in Paris and was married to a famous French actress. Because of his Jewish background he was deported to Auschwitz by the Nazisand had to fight there for the entertainment of the camp commander.—Anonymous
